statements: SELECT * FROM payment_processing WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM payment_processing WHERE payment_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount FROM payment_processing WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM payment_processing WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT transaction_id, payment_method FROM payment_processing WHERE payment_amount < 50 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_processing WHERE customer_id = '589949cf-4ad7-4935-b4ed-b3611cb902af' LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_amount, payment_method FROM payment_processing WHERE payment_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) as transaction_count, SUM(payment_amount) as total_payment FROM payment_processing GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_payment > 500;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM payment_processing ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, payment_amount, payment_method, transaction_date FROM payment_processing WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transaction_info;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, currency, transaction_date, customer_id FROM transaction_info WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_info GROUP BY customer_id HAVING SUM(amount) > 5000;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, currency FROM transaction_info WHERE currency = 'USD' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_method, card_number, expiry_date FROM payment_details WHERE expiry_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transaction_info ORDER BY transaction_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT amount, currency FROM transaction_info WHERE amount > 1000 AND currency = 'USD';
SELECT * FROM transaction_info WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) as transaction_count FROM transaction_info GROUP BY customer_id HAVING transaction_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM payment_details JOIN transaction_info ON payment_details.customer_id = transaction_info.customer_id WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM Payments;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM Customers;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM Payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM Transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT DISTINCT payment_method FROM Payments;
SELECT * FROM Payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC, amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, amount FROM Payments WHERE amount > 1000 AND payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE status = 'Completed' AND transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT t.transaction_id, p.payment_date, c.customer_name FROM Transactions t INNER JOIN Payments p ON t.payment_id = p.payment_id INNER JOIN Customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id ORDER BY p.payment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, status FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, email, order_date, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_type, card_number, status FROM transactions JOIN payment_methods ON transactions.payment_method_id = payment_methods.payment_method_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John' AND phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM payment_info;
SELECT payment_id, user_id, payment_amount FROM payment_info ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, card_number FROM payment_info WHERE card_expiry_date > CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_status FROM payment_history WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM transaction_log WHERE transaction_status = 'Success' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_account;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payment_history ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, card_number, cvv FROM payment_info WHERE card_expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM user_account WHERE created_at >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT log_id, transaction_date, transaction_status FROM transaction_log WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase';
